org.princehouse.mica.base.net.tcpip

Class TCPAddress

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.princehouse.mica.base.net.tcpip.TCPAddress
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.esotericsoftware.kryo.KryoSerializable, java.io.Externalizable, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Address>, Address

    public class TCPAddress
extends java.lang.Object
implements Address, java.io.Externalizable, com.esotericsoftware.kryo.KryoSerializable
    TCP/IP Address implementation. See TCPAddress.valueOf to create a TCPAddress from a "host:port" string
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
